db.query: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `###poll_answer`;

CREATE TABLE `###poll_answer` ( `answer_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `question_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `position` int(11) NOT NULL, `title` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `content` text, `is_correct` tinyint(4) default NULL, `user_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `num_views` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', PRIMARY KEY (`answer_id`), KEY `question_id` (`question_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `###poll_question`;

CREATE TABLE `###poll_question` ( `question_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `title` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `content` varchar(255) default NULL, `created_date` datetime NOT NULL, `start_date` datetime NOT NULL, `end_date` datetime default NULL, `is_active` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, `multiple_options` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, `user_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `num_views` int(11) default NULL, `language` varchar(10) default NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`question_id`), KEY `idx_language` (`language`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS ###poll_answer;

CREATE TABLE ###poll_answer ( answer_id integer NOT NULL, question_id integer NOT NULL, "position" integer NOT NULL, title character varying(255) NOT NULL, content text, is_correct smallint, user_id integer NOT NULL, num_views integer DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL ); CREATE SEQUENCE poll_answer_answer_id_seq START WITH 1 INCREMENT BY 1 NO MAXVALUE NO MINVALUE CACHE 1; ALTER SEQUENCE poll_answer_answer_id_seq OWNED BY ###poll_answer.answer_id; SELECT pg_catalog.setval('poll_answer_answer_id_seq', 1, false);
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS ###poll_question;

CREATE TABLE ###poll_question ( question_id integer NOT NULL, title character varying(255) NOT NULL, content character varying(255) DEFAULT NULL::character varying, created_date time without time zone NOT NULL, start_date time without time zone NOT NULL, end_date time without time zone, is_active smallint NOT NULL, multiple_options smallint NOT NULL, user_id integer NOT NULL, num_views integer, language character varying(10) DEFAULT NULL::character varying ); CREATE SEQUENCE poll_question_question_id_seq START WITH 1 INCREMENT BY 1 NO MAXVALUE NO MINVALUE CACHE 1; ALTER SEQUENCE poll_question_question_id_seq OWNED BY ###poll_question.question_id; SELECT pg_catalog.setval('poll_question_question_id_seq', 1, false);
